Package logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Character
    Class which is an abstraction of each symbol of the game map
    Door
    Class that is used to represent the doors of the map Extends Character
    Drunken
    Class used to represent the Drunken type of guard, Extends Guard
    Dungeon
    Class which has all the information of the first level of the game (Guard level) Extends GameMap
    GameMap
    Abstraction of the different levels of the game
    GameState
    Class that has the information of the state of the current game
    Guard
    Abstract class that represents the Guard of the game, extends Character
    Hero
    Class that represents the Hero of the game, extends Character
    Keep
    Represents the second level of the game (Keep level)
    Lever
    Class used to represent the Lever of the map, Extends Character type
    Ogre
    Class that represents the Ogre type in the game
    Position
    Abstraction os the position of all the characters of the map
    Rookie
    Class of the Rookie type of the Guard , extends Guard
    Suspicious
    Class of Suspicious type of the Guard, Extends Guard
